prompts: Create a grass-type Pokemon with vibrant green foliage and a large flower on its back.
Imagine a Pokemon that has both plant and poison elements, showcasing a balance of beauty and danger.
Generate a creature with a bulbous shape, perfect for a nature-themed Pokemon that evolves from a smaller form.
Design a Pokemon that thrives in forests and grasslands, featuring a unique combination of colors and features.
Show me a Pokemon that resembles a small dinosaur, adorned with blooming flowers and thick leaves.
Give me a visual representation of a charming middle evolution Pokemon that is friendly yet fierce in battle.
Make a Pokemon that embodies the essence of nature with a gentle personality and a striking floral accent.
